xml.data:
Home » 39P3 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3) » 1 Hetuduka, Tika » 1.11 Hetuduka, Sekkhattika » 1.11.1 Sekkhapada » 1.11.1.7 Pañhāvāra » Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
Hetuduka, Tika
Hetuduka, Sekkhattika
Sekkhapada
Pañhāvāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetvādi
334.
697Hetu sekkho dhammo hetussa sekkhassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo…  tīṇi.
698Hetu sekkho dhammo hetussa sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātādhipati…  tīṇi.
699Nahetu sekkho dhammo nahetussa sekkhassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo—  sahajātādhipati…  tīṇi.
700Hetu sekkho dhammo hetussa sekkhassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
335.
701Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā cha, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, vipāke nava, āhāre tīṇi, indriye nava, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
<< Paccayacatukkaup Paccanīyuddhāra >>
